note: Already old and getting older much faster these days.  Raised on the beaches of So Cal. Studied history, social ecology, physics, and art at UCI. In the USAF for a time, a leo for a time. Ran art galleries. Was a ghostwriter (I did say I was old). At 64 learned to ride a Harley and spent the next few years riding across the US. Still haven’t figured out what to be when I grow up.
